name: CSV Import
author: Daniel Neves
source:
$@import fileinfo, file

$@input name, character, description = "Name of the variable to hold this table."

$@page p1, "Import Settings"

$@input header, logical, FALSE, description = "Whether the file contains the names of the variables as its first line."
$@input sep, choices, ",", choices=list("Comma (,)"=",", "Semicolon (;)"=";", "Space"=" ", "Tab"="\t"),
    description = "The field separator character."
$@input dec, choices, ".", choices=list(".", ","), description = "The character used in the file for decimal points"
$@input skip, numeric, 0, description = "The number of lines of the data file to skip before beginning to read data."

df <- read.csv(fileinfo$path, ${d:: x:header=header, skip=skip, sep=sep, dec=dec}) 

$@export df, ".name"

$@output Table, table

df %>% head(10)

$@output Summary, markdown

**Filename:** `r fileinfo$name`

| Option | Value |
|-----|:---:|
| Header | `${header}` |
| Separator character | `${sep}` |
| Decimal character | `${dec}` |
